page.title: 11SERVICES IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: Mrs. Wain's shop is the newsagent and Post Office. She sells sweets ,toys, cards and comics.Mrs.Longson's is the general store,it's also a grocer and a confectioners.Mr. Mottershead sells pies,cakes,bread and eggs, they are the bakers. Meals on wheels comes to the old people every day.The libray van has all sorts of books. They come every fortnight on a tuesday. Mrs. Baxter is a general store she sells drinks,tin foods,sweets and ice cream. It used to be the Post Office. The fish van comes every wednesday. There is one phone box. There are three post boxes. Harrington Arms is the only pub. In the playing field there are two slides,two climbing frames,six swings,a roundabout,a rocking horse and a tennis court. by Adele Ashworth & Katharine Tuke.
